alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 02 at 11:07PM EDT until October 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Fisheating Creek near Palmdale affecting Glades County. Fisheating Creek near Palmdale affecting Glades County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding remains possible. * WHERE...Fisheating Creek near Palmdale. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Fisheating creek is coming out of flood stage. Access road to campground and the bath house are still Flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.9 feet on 09/12/1940. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 400 PM EDT.
